sentences.en: A leakage of kerosene has polluted water supplies.
sentences.cn: 泄漏的煤油污染了水源。

sentences.en: A servant lighted a hanging kerosene lamp.
At once I turn up the wick of my kerosene lamp.
sentences.cn: 灯火的带子也即刻被我旋高了.

sentences.en: He filled a cup with kerosene, castor oil and vinegar.
sentences.cn: 他往杯子里装满了煤油 、 蓖麻油和醋.

sentences.en: It is like putting out a fire with kerosene.
It is the handwheel adjustment of the kerosene stove wick.
sentences.cn: 这是煤油炉炉芯的手轮调节处.

sentences.en: It was soon found that the kerosene straight from crude oil was sometimes not very satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 不久就发现原油中的直馏煤油有时并不使人满意.

sentences.en: Kerosene is a by - product of petroleum refining.
sentences.cn: 煤油是提炼石油的 副产品.

sentences.en: Miss Liu was talking to Xiangzi under the kerosene lamp. They all nodded to each other.
sentences.cn: 刘姑娘正和祥子在煤气灯底下说话呢, 大家彼此点了点头.

sentences.en: She puffed out the kerosene lamp.
The air reeked of kerosene and huge aircraft rumbled overhead.
sentences.cn: 空气中散发着煤油味，巨型飞机在头顶隆隆地响着。

sentences.en: The fuel and oxidizer are kerosene and liquid oxygen, respectively.
sentences.cn: 燃烧剂和氧化剂分别为煤油和液氧.

sentences.en: The old man used a kerosene lantern.
sentences.cn: 老人过去用一盏煤油提灯.

sentences.en: We ran out of kerosene, wherefore we used coal.
sentences.cn: 煤油用完了, 因此我们用煤.

sentences.en: With a flash, the kerosene lamp went out.

phrases.tran_cn: 喷气机用煤油，航空煤油
煤油引擎，煤油机；煤油发动机

trans.tran_en: a clear oil that is burnt to provide heat or light
